channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Australia's Best House
channel.desc: From a modern home in Melbourne's Eastern Suburbs, to a stunning home located by the water on the Gold Coast, we are looking for Australia's Best Home with a construction cost of over one million Australian Dollars.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Draw home decor and design inspiration from some of South Africa's top interior designers.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Sunday Lunch
channel.desc: Tom switches things up a little today with some delicious Indian-inspired dishes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: This week, from a home named after an urban park in New York City, to a home described as the panorama, we get to walk through the experts top choices for Australia's best modern homes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Homemark
channel.desc: Infomercial.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: Nicki Chapman is on an emotionally charged property search in rural Somerset.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We look at homeopathy's approach to maintaining health. We share a couple of delicious smoothie recipe ideas. We'll be discussing the treatment for Sexual Dysfunction in men.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: Jim longs to get back to entertaining in his precious home. But with only three days, can R?is?n, Peter and the Home Rescue team transform his home in time for his 70th birthday party.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Rochelle Humes...
channel.desc: S1/E6'. Rochelle is challenged to help a family in St Albans. Her brief, to create a new office, library and bar from a family's existing garage.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Bessie starts off in Canberra at Golden. Waterside design and tips for your own home and Bessie visits another multi-million-dollar contemporary home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House

channel.desc: We look at homeopathy's approach to maintaining health. We share a couple of delicious smoothie recipe ideas. We'll be discussing the treatment for Sexual Dysfunction in men.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: Jim longs to get back to entertaining in his precious home. But with only three days, can R?is?n, Peter and the Home Rescue team transform his home in time for his 70th birthday party.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Paul and Karryn, from the beachside suburb of Port Melbourne would like to find their dream home in Noosa, Sunshine Coast. They seek a view of the ocean with a balcony to enjoy that view.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Homemark
channel.desc: Infomercial.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Rochelle Humes...
channel.desc: S1/E7'. Rochelle redesigns a newly bought house belonging to NHS workers Ali and Shareen. Expecting their first baby and keen for a 'wow' factor.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Your Home, Made Perfect UK
channel.desc: Cutting-edge virtual reality and visual effects enable people to see what the future of their home could look like, before building it in reality.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Australia's Best House
channel.desc: Host Megan Gales and the judges are looking for homes with character that can be in the running to be titled Australia's Best House.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Brigitta and Olivier love Sydney Harbour and its gorgeous beaches. They seek for their dream beach home in Mosman. A home to settle down in for at least the next 10 years for their young family.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Ten Minute Kitchen
channel.desc: We start with an all-time favourite and a go to recipe when we often struggle to decide what to cook. One of the things often found in the pantry is pasta and the episode starts with Scott Pickett's Rigatoni Sausage Ragu.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey
channel.desc: Zacchary Bird is in the kitchen reinventing a classic with his Tomato Lox & Schmear Bagels and Simon does something different too with his Asian Style Guac.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
channel.desc: Civil engineer Charles Webster, driven by a love for challenging designs, is building a crescent-shaped home on his Coromandel site, inspired by desert dunes.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Everyday
channel.desc: Roast chicken gets a Korean-style twist with sesame and kimchi glaze, then creamy prawn-stuffed salmon.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener And Friends
channel.desc: Join Tanya Visser and her gardening friends as they showcase stunning gardens by top designers, offer easy DIY projects, and keep viewers updated on the latest gardening tools.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Terry and Ashley have a battle with nature as they try to get their garden-which has abandoned for 100 years-under control.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Draw home decor and design inspiration from some of South Africa's top interior designers.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: James starts in a zero net eco home. A kitchen tip and recipe you can use at home. Dave shows us the biggest landscape to date and Mike gets a tour of Stephen Moore's home.

channel.title: Rochelle Humes...
channel.desc: S1/E7'. Rochelle redesigns a newly bought house belonging to NHS workers Ali and Shareen. Expecting their first baby and keen for a 'wow' factor.

channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We delve deeper into the causes and risk factors of Sexual Dysfunction in women as well as some of the steps to take when seeking help.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Carlo's Reno Rescue
channel.desc: Carlos Spencer goes from chip kicks to Chippy - renovating rooms for deserving New Zealanders. Accompanied by Jarrod and Jewel, the team seeks out deserving Kiwis.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.
